definition[0]: to send something somewhere, especially in order to sell it
definition[1]: to send or deliver goods to someone, usually someone who has bought them
example[0]: Another copy of the document is sent to the party to whom the goods are consigned.
definition[2]: if you consign a work of art to an AUCTIONEER, you ask them to sell it
